name: Magical Synthezier
description: Interact with the magical properties of items

name: The Bank
description: Store your important items at the bank.

name: Fusion Cabin
description: Fuse three of the same item into a higher rarity of the same item.

name: The Forge
description: Upgrade your gear at the forge.

name: Fortune Teller
description: Use your items to make higher rarities more common

name: Tinker Hut
description: Turn your leftover commons and desynth materials

name: Museum
description: A permanent list of all your crafting achievements
